abstract.p: AdRelevance, division of Media Metrix, says in report that 97 percent of all Web sites still carry standard banner ads, even though more Web sites are carrying multiple types and sizes of online advertisements (S)

block.p: AdRelevance, a division of Media Metrix, said in a report released yesterday that 97 percent of all Web sites still carried standard banner ads, even though more Web sites are carrying multiple types and sizes of online advertisements. The AdRelevance Rate Card and Ad Dimensions Report, which analyzed nonnegotiated rate card prices between January 2000 and June 2000 for banner and button advertisements on more than 400 sites, also found that rate card prices for standard banners have declined slightly in the last six months and that a majority of sites offer discounts on full banner rates.
